definition: to open up/to spread/sheet of paper/classifier for flat objects, sheet/classifier for votes
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.english: It seems the growth of its arrogance.
sentences.chinese: 這似乎滋長了它的囂張氣焰。

sentences.english: This is the essential of the arrogance.
sentences.chinese: 這是必不可少的囂張氣焰。

sentences.english: But rumors of his arrogance anger him.
sentences.chinese: 但是傳聞他的憤怒他的囂張氣焰。
